meta.name: description
meta.content: Chester Charter Scholars Academy is a public non-profit charter school in the Chester Upland School District. Our rigorous academic program combines the fine arts with traditional classroom subjects in ways designed to foster confidence and purpose and to significantly deepen academic engagement.
Welcome to Chester Charter Scholars Academy

The Chester Charter Scholars Academy is a public non-profit charter school in the Chester Upland School District. Our rigorous academic program combines the fine arts with traditional classroom subjects in ways designed to foster confidence and purpose and to significantly deepen academic engagement.

div.script: jQuery('.switcher .selected').click(function() {jQuery('.switcher .option a img').each(function() {if(!jQuery(this)[0].hasAttribute('src'))jQuery(this).attr('src', jQuery(this).attr('data-gt-lazy-src'))});if(!(jQuery('.switcher .option').is(':visible'))) {jQuery('.switcher .option').stop(true,true).delay(100).slideDown(500);jQuery('.switcher .selected a').toggleClass('open')}}); jQuery('body').not('.switcher').click(function(e) {if(jQuery('.switcher .option').is(':visible') && e.target != jQuery('.switcher .option').get(0)) {jQuery('.switcher .option').stop(true,true).delay(100).slideUp(500);jQuery('.switcher .selected a').toggleClass('open')}});

div.class: vc_row vc_row-fluid white alt smallish vc_column-gap-1 vc_row-o-equal-height vc_row-flex

div.p: Our curriculum promotes innovation, collaboration, focus, and perseverance as faculties essential to personal success and well-being.
Our exciting new Chester city campus is uniquely designed to match the needs of a K-12 arts integration program.
We are an entirely not-for-profit entity. Our programâs continued success depends upon the dedication of our community of faculty, staff, donors, volunteers, and friends.
Applications are accepted from any family residing in the Chester Upland or surrounding school districts.

As part of our digital learning plan, CCSA will loan a Chromebook to students who need one for learning at home. If you are fortunate and have electronic devices at home to support your childâs learning, we ask that you please reserve this program for those who do not. If your child needs a Chromebook for learning at home,

p.a: Click here to submit a request and we will do our best to accommodate.Â

div.p:
â CCSA will notify you of the exact date and time when you can pick up a Chromebook.
â Use of the Chromebook requires that you have at home internet.
â If you do not have at home internet, indicate that on the form and we will provide you an alternative device with built-in internet.
â All devices must be returned on June 9 or any date determined by CCSA.

div.class: vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_100 vc_sep_pos_align_center vc_separator_no_text vc_sep_color_background-light

div.p: Chester Charter Scholars Academy is committed to providing the most effective methods and systems available for the continuation of our high-quality education despite the exceptional circumstances of the full school closure in the state of Pennsylvania. We will deliver planned instruction in a live and asynchronous learning environment. Click below to read the full Continuity of Education (CoE) Program or select the quick guide by grade.
We will have FREE student meals prepared for pick up at CCSA every Monday during the COVID school closure. Any child under 18 is eligible to receive meals whether he/she attends CCSA or not.

Monday, April 20 from 9:00am to 1:00pm
â Receive 5 breakfasts and 5 lunches for each student.

p.a: Click here to reserve meals for your child.Â

div.p: By order of Gov. Wolf CCSA will remain closed through the end of the 2019-20 academic year in an effort to curb the spread of COVID-19. Additionally, all spring sports and any school related activities are cancelled. Staff will be in touch with your child periodically during this time away from school in the event that he/she has questions or needs assistance. We will continue to communicate and provide updates as the situation evolves. Thank you for your understanding and flexibility.

Online School Resumes / Monday, April 13
â We will return to the online teaching schedule detailed in the Continuity of Education Program.

We are a public non-profit charter school in the Chester Upland School District. Our rigorous academic program integrates the fine arts with traditional classroom subjects in ways designed to foster confidence and purpose and to significantly deepen academic engagement.

p.a: Learn more about our vision and who we areÂ
